Events

Regular events

  • Open nights are every Tuesday from 6pm - 9pm, and we welcome everyone!

  • Side-projects Saturday is usually every second Saturday afternoon. Double check in the chatroom or check the facebook events list to make sure. The goal is to bring an incomplete project and get some work done!

Workshops and one-off events

These are also listed on our Facebook events list and our TidyHQ events list
